#summary Details about the RCShield

== Overview ==

RCShield is a contraction for R(emote) C(ontrol) Shield.<br>
<a href="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/RCShield_assembly_8.jpg">
<img src="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/RCShield_assembly_8.jpg" width="600"><a>

==Features==
 * Comes as 2 boards to allow various configurations
  * From 1 to 5 directly accessible channels
 * XBee connector to allow any XBee solution.
 * I2C connector to connect a magnetometer or a GPS through 
 * compatible with any 3.3V Arduino Uno footprint board
 * All digital ports are replicated
 * FTDI chip to allow programming of any Arduino compatible board. TouScruino and Remotuino can be programmed simply by connecting on the shield.
<br>
